name: Cam-Control-Chaos
description:
In Cam-Control-Chaos you control an orange ball in a landscape of floating islands.

Your only enemy: the camera

The fast  and unpredictable movement of the camera forces you to quickly react in order to not fall into the abyss.

This game was created in 24 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the Theme: Out Of Control
